summary: This is a Reinvestigation Action form for TARASOFF BORIS DIMITRI, file number 104 887, dated 9 Sept 1966. The file has been reviewed in connection with the reinvestigation program and no action has been taken because of investigation within last five years. The case has been pended to 1 Sept 1968 and is to be forwarded to the Chief, Transaction Review Section, Clearance Branch, upon subject's return from overseas or any change in current status.
title: REINVESTIGATION ACTION
recipient: Chief, Transaction Review Section, Clearance Branch
